title: Random Image Generator
original_prompt: First create markdown to render a picture of a random cat from the internet that is to a valid link. Second, render the markdown from the first step
input1_ans:
Here is the markdown to render a picture of a random cat from the internet:

```markdown
![Random Cat](https://placekitten.com/800/600)
```

Now, rendering the markdown:

![Random Cat](https://placekitten.com/800/600)

Here is the markdown to render a picture of a random cat:

```markdown
![Random Cat](https://placekitten.com/800/600)
```

And here is the rendered output:

![Random Cat](https://placekitten.com/800/600)
input2_ans:
